text: The forms support autofill via query parameters

what i meant is, is it possible to do that in the HubSpot forms? i was hoping i could override the HubSpot form html into something like this. with also the name=em having a separate directory on HubSpot forms when future clients input their emails as wells as those emails will autofill the redirect forms' email input field. im sorry if im not making any sense at all tho. just trying to relaying what my client wants lol

Sorry still not 100% sure what you're trying to ask. But based on your screenshot it looks like you changed the action to submit somewhere else. If thats the case then you dont need to use a HubSpot form at all you can just go custom. If you need to also submit to HubSpot at the same time you could just use the api instead of a normal HubSpot form
